attributes.action: sack the head of child protection at Haringey Council and the case workers involved in the Baby P case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax payers fund a public service to protect children, yet at Haringey, despite numerous visits, warnings and letters, they failed in this duty - with horrific and fatal consequences.  This petition demands that those whose job it was to investigate this case are removed from their position and the person responsible for overseeing their work is also removed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
